mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Clark, Jacob C.; Purdy, William S. to Pierpont, Francis Harrison
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Clark, Jacob C.; Purdy, William S.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov FH Pierpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wh Nov 24 1861. By Telegraph from Buckhannon 24 1861. By your order we have arrested and confined in Jail at this place Wm. G. Pierson Enoch Cunningham & Christian Simon. What shall we do with them? We await your further order. Corporal W.S. Purdy & Corporal J.C. Clark 3rd Va Vols 32D101pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Clark, Jacob C.; Purdy, William S.
Buckhannon, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis Harrison
